author: jeongeun
body:
#### PR description:
Update event content definitions to explicitly have RECO to be a superset of AOD and for FEVT to be a superset of RECO : Defining the RecoJetsAOD PSets first and then RecoJetsRECO content format imports the RecoJetsAOD one and adds additional keep collections to reproduce the exact RECO event content. The FEVT is also done similarly. (example: [RecoMuon_EventContent_cff.py](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_11_1_X/RecoMuon/Configuration/python/RecoMuon_EventContent_cff.py)).

In RecoJetsAOD case,  we use "keep" instead of "drop" (drop doubles_\*Jets_sigmas_\*,  drop doubles_\*Jets_rhos_\*) 
 
#### PR validation:
Event Content comparison check was also done and there is no change with this updates.
Tested in CMSSW_11_1_X_2020-02-20-2300, the basic test all passed in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html).
title: Remove drop and update the RecoJets event content formats
